body.name: LED Desk Lamp with Clamp Dimmable Desk Light for Home Office 18 Lighting Modes Adjustable Gooseneck Clip on Lamp, 18W Eye-Caring Study Lamp, Ultra Bright Desk Lamps(White)

features: [Powerful Lighting LED Desk Lamp] This 18.2-inch wide LED lamp boasts 2180LUX brightness from 15.7 inches below its center. With an adjustable height up to 28.5 inches, it's ideal for multi-monitor setups and spacious offices. Note that the lamp uses a USB connection and an adapter is not included. Please use a 5V 3.5A plug for power supply.

[Stepless Dimming Table Lamp] The desktop lamp has three color modes: warm light (3000K), warm white light (4000K), and white light (6000K). Each mode has six brightness levels, making a total of 18 lighting modes suitable for different scenarios. be at peace with some heat is generated during operation for reasons of extended life.

[Eye-Care Desk Lighting] Our study lamp uses 96 LED beads, with a wide range of illumination and uniform soft light, which protects your eyes from glare . The asymmetric optical design eliminates the reflected light from the screen, protecting your eyes even when working, reading or studying for a long time.Additionally, there is a one-button reading mode suitable for learning. Moreover, the desk lamp has a memory function.

[Space-Saving Clamp Light] Our desk lamp with clamp securely attaches to desktops up to 2.6 inches thick. The 25.2-inch flexible gooseneck tube offers a full 360-degree range of motion, ensuring versatile and multi-directional lighting. Designed with care, the metal clip is enhanced with a silicone pad to prevent any unsightly desk scratches. Perfect for desktops and bookshelves, it saves space over traditional table lamps.

[Reliable Customer Service] Exceptional Support for Confident. We stand by our products, offering a comprehensive one-year warranty that ensures your investment is protected. Shop with confidence, knowing that your satisfaction is our priority.

What should I do if the lamp gets warm during use? To extend its lifespan, the desk lamp is designed with enhanced heat dissipation. It is normal for it to generate some heat during operation. Please feel confident in its use. Why doesn't this lamp come with an adapter? This desk lamp comes with a USB connection and does not include an adapter. Please use a 5V 3.5A plug for power, which you will need to provide separately. Why is there a buzzing sound when the lamp is turned on? The presence of this sound is not considered normal for the product. It may be due to an incompatible adapter. We recommend trying a different adapter with specifications of 5V 3.5A to see if the issue persists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Work Light for Desktop Music Studio
reviews.reviewText: I'm setting up a VERY small hardware (DAWless) music studio for live jamming and needed decent light that covered the entire desk area. Bought a couple f FAILS before this one, so.. my hopes were modest.First, this thing is decently solid. Not super strong but will go the distabce for me.Second, the light is bright enough to see the labels on all the knobs and buttons on my gear, and being visually impaired, this is DAMN impressive!Third, it moves easily if I want to get it over a specific module for editing, Major plus!Finally, assembly took 3 minutes and that includes drinking coffee! I didn't even need my glasses to get this working, holy hell, that's a first!!The remote is nice, I can turn the light on and off from my DAW station across the room.Yes, I am old and lazy, heh.If the gooseneck were a bit stronger this would be nothng but 5 stars.There's a good chance I'll get another for my DAW desk to light up my 2 MIDI master keyboards. My current light is a hack, ugh.Quite happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a portable lamp to do my nails and this one is perfect! The clamp connects to where I need it and it doesn't move once I close it. The cord needs an adapter to plug it in but isn't included. I just used one I had for a cellphone. The actual lamp moves easily to adjust it to where I need it to be and stays put. It has a panel of controls on the cord to turn it on, brighten it darken, and change the light type. The highest setting is very bright! It's perfect for helping me see when I'm doing detailed nail art. The lowest setting is good for when I'm reading but don't want a glaring light. For the price, this lamp was everything I needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and functional!
reviews.reviewText: Used for my home office studio desk - love the flexibility, length (vertically and the light itself horizontally), remote feature, and even the steps in between the 3 color modes! Very functional, very bright, perfect for my needs. Goose neck is a little unstable, but make sure the bottom of the neck is tightened into the clamp. I secured my neck to my monitor stand with some rubber cable ties and it is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s good, but not the best
reviews.reviewText: The packaging was nice and neat, everything was wrapped properly to be delivered safe.As I unpacked the lamp, I noticed that the connector between the lamp and the goose neck has varying gaps (see the photos), which doesn’t affect the functionality but it’s something that caught my attention.The table screw was easy to install, it has a small soft pad to prevent any scratching of the table surface, which is nice because I have a glass table.The length of the cord is perfect, it’s not too short neither too long, just right. The switch is convenient and easy to use.I wouldn’t say it’s the brightest lamp I’ve seen, but I definitely like that it doesn’t take much space off the table surface and is very versatile to use. Horizontal lighting does bright up the working surface evenly, which is great, too.The length of the light stria is a bit less than 27” monitor width (couple of inches shorter), so if you expect to set up the lamp right above a monitor, keep it in mind.I liked having options for light temperature, I usually work with the neutral light and read with yellow light on. The light brightness is a convenient setting, too. But I usually use the max one.After all, nice lamp, but considering the price and size, I honestly expected better assembly quality. Also, the gooseneck makes these cracking noises sometimes, so after all I give it 4 stars. Would recommend it though, as it is a quite easy and minimalistic solution for working space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really do love this lamp. Every color temperature is bright. I also enjoy how little space it takes up on my desk! I will say if you have other lights that are remote operated they may be on the same frequency and can turn off or turn on the lamp if you try to use them. This isn't a huge problem, but certain colors for one of my other lights turns those lamp off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp for my home office and it’s amazing. It has a remote control, a dimmer and looks great in my office. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best & Easy to Use Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: The FOVOW LED Desk Lamp has been a game-changer for my home office setup. With its versatile clamp design and 18 adjustable lighting modes, it provides the perfect illumination for any task. The dimmable feature is a fantastic touch, allowing me to customize the lighting to suit my needs. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a top-notch desk light!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Light ever I have used, 6000k, 24W, No eye irritation, Light Weight, Easy to fix, Good Packing
reviews.reviewText: Like I said, 24 W with 6000k (They said 6500k) day light. Just added to my computer desk, nice bright view.First bought one, seeing the functionality, bought another for my kid.Easy to fix in minutes, working nicely.
